name: Hal Ward, B.S., B.A.
resume_snippet: Hal Ward, B.S., B.A. PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:	  Pharmacovigilance consultant and PV leader with 30 years of global experience across pharma and CROs, managing teams in the Americas, EU, and Asia/Pacific regions. Brings a rare blend of sponsor and vendor expertise, having served as Interim Head of PV for multiple biotech startups and led PV operations at top CROs like Covance and Premier Research.
